page_content: The page is about ordering tax forms and guides related to various types of taxes.

The page provides FAQs about the IT strategy for schools, including the use of the PUPIL software for school administration.

The page offers a collection of publications related to water management, including guidelines and forms.
The page discusses the expansion of financial aid for businesses affected by COVID-19.
The page serves as a personnel handbook, offering guidelines and forms related to employment with the Canton of St. Gallen.
